ROM.Changelog:
====================
* Mido OTA Changelog (22-09-2017)
- Kernel is Improved - Much Smoother than the Previous Build - Fingerprint Updated with Stock MIUI 9 (7.0/NRD90M/V8.5.4.0.NCFMIED) - Fingerprint is now very fast in this build
[NOTE : After Download of this OTA Package you can not direcly flash the package with the Updater App. The OTA pack Downloaded in Cosmic Folder of your device's Internal Storage. Please flash the Package in TWRP Recovery]
